posts.title: leetcode 1
posts.text: 1. Two sumhttps://leetcode.com/problems/two-sum/Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution. Example:1234Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9,Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9,return [0, 1]. Solution123public class solution { } Note
